shortDescription: A command injection vulnerability in the web interface of the Zyxel NWA-1100-NH firmware could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary OS commands on the device.
vulnerabilityName: Zyxel nwa1100-nh Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
